body:
Hi Mostapha,

Thank you for your answer.

I tried to modify the activitySchedule in order to see if some changes could occur but the result is the same.

I don't understand the problem since I used the same procedure to costumize also the other schedules and they don't create any problems.

As further evidence I tried to link all the schedules to the E+ component and it works properly.



Do you have any other ideas?



Thank you very much for your work.
